Class DirectionalPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--wm.ImagePanel
                          |
                          +--wm.DirectionalPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, Constants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class DirectionalPanel
extends ImagePanel
implements Constants

Class that models a panel with an image inside, and a direction (up, left, down, right).

See Also:

Field Detail

crossed

private boolean crossed
Indicates whether the panel should be crossed or not. It's useful to indicate that some agent was killed.

direction

private int direction
The direction of the element in this panel.
See Also:
Constants.UP, Constants.LEFT, Constants.DOWN, Constants.RIGHT

getCrossed

public boolean getCrossed()
Checks whether this panel is to be crossed or not.
Returns:
true if this panel is to be crossed out; false otherwise.
